verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: For a while] , [ARG0: it] [V: looked] [ARG1: as if Trump would hit his 3 % economic growth target for 2017 . But he did n't] .
For a while , it looked as if Trump [V: would] hit his 3 % economic growth target for 2017 . But he did n't .
For a while , it looked as if [ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: hit] [ARG1: his 3 % economic growth target for 2017] . But he did n't .
For a while , it looked as if Trump would hit his 3 % economic growth target for 2017 . But he [V: did] n't .
